meteringrange: EV 0-20 (at 23°C/73°F with EF 50mm f/1.4 USM lens, ISO 100)
shutterspeeds: 1/8000 to 30 sec. (1/3-, 1/2- or 1-stop increments), X-sync at 1/250 sec. (with EOS dedicated external Speedlites; 1/250 maximum with other shoe-mount flashes, and 1/60th-1/250th with studio strobes*) * maximum sync speed with studio strobes will depend upon flash characteristics and connection method; testing is encouraged to verify fastest possible sync speed with specific studio flash equipment
afpointselection: Automatic selection; Manual selection: 19 AF points, or only inner 9 AF points (C.Fn III-9-1), or outer 9 AF points (C.Fn III-9-2)
magnifiedview: Magnifiable by 5x or 10x at AF point
drivemodes: Single, silent, high-speed continuous (approx. 5 fps), low-speed continuous (approx. 3 fps), 10- or 2-sec. self-timer
batterycheck: Automatic, displayed in six levels. Precise readout of percentage remaining, shots taken since last charge, calibration recommended, and approx. remaining battery life are displayed with Battery Info menu setting.
externalflashsettings: Flash function settings, Flash C.Fn settings
dustdeletefeature: The sound clip recorded with the built-in microphone is attached to the image
compatiblelenses: Canon EF, TS-E, and MP-E lenses (except EF-S lenses)
exposurecompensation: Exposure Compensation (user-set): up to +/-3 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-half increments Auto Bracketing (AEB): 3 shots, up to +/- 3 stops, in 1/3 or 1/2 stop increments, in all exposure modes. Sequence can be changed via C.Fn I-5
recordingfunctions: (1) Standard (2) Auto switch media (recording media switched automatically) (3) Rec. separately (specified image size for each recording media) (4) Rec. to multiple (same image recorded to all recording media)
exposurecontrol: Program AE (shiftable), Shutter speed-priority AE, Aperture-priority AE, E-TTL II program AE (Evaluative flash metering, Averaged flash metering), Manual, Bulb
weight: 340g/12.0 oz. (excluding power cord and protective covers)
erase: Single image, all images in a folder, all images in the memory card or check-marked images can be erased or unprotected.
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (Transmission: reflection ratio of 37:63)
afassistbeam: None. Emitted by EX-series Speedlite or optional ST-E2 Speedlite Transmitter
isospeedrecommendedexposureindex: Equivalent to ISO 100-1600* (in 1/3-stop or whole stop increments), ISO speed can be expanded to ISO 50 and 3200 (via C.Fn I-3) * Standard output sensitivity. Recommended exposure index.
filename: Preset code, User setting 1 (4 characters); User setting 2 (3 characters + 1 image size character)
aelock: Auto: Applied in One-Shot AF mode with evaluative metering when focus is achieved Manual (user-set): By AE lock button in all metering modes
backuprecording: With WFT-E2/E2A attached, all images and folders in the CF card and SD card can be backed up to USB external media
colortemperaturecompensation: White balance correction: ±9 stops in full-stop increments White balance bracketing: ±3 stops in full-stop increments *Blue/amber direction or magenta/green direction possible.
protect: Single image, all images in a folder, or all images in the memory card can be protected or cancel the image protection
pcterminal: Provided; accepts third-party flash units with sync line voltages up to 250V maximum
shootingmodes: (1) Remote Live View shooting (with a personal computer installed with EOS Utility) (2) Live View shooting
powersaving: Provided. Power turns off after 1, 2, 4, 8, 15, 30 min.
battery: One dedicated lithium-ion battery pack LP-E4 AC power can be supplied via the AC Adapter Kit ACK-E4 (included)
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I and II, SD/SDHC Memory Card (1 slot each), and/or External media (USB v.2.0 hard drive, via optional Canon WFT-E2A transmitter), compatible with UDMA-compliant CF cards, and SDHC SD cards
depthoffieldpreview: Enabled with depth-of-field preview button; possible in Live View Function
batterylife: At 73°F/23°C: Approx. (TBA) At 32°F/0°C: Approx. (TBA) The above figures apply when a fully-charged Battery Pack LP-E4 is used
recordingformat: DCF 2.0 (Exif 2.21): JPEG, RAW and RAW+JPEG simultaneous recording possible. Multiple options for recording images on two memory cards, and onto compatible external USB hard drives (via optional Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E2A)
filesize: JPEG/Large: Approx. (TBA) MB (5,616 x 3,744) JPEG/Medium 1: Approx. (TBA) MB (4,992 x 3,328) JPEG/Medium 2: Approx. (TBA) MB (4,080 x 2,720) JPEG/Small: Approx. (TBA) MB (2,784 x 1,856) RAW: Approx. (TBA) MB (5,616 x 3,744) sRAW: Approx. (TBA) MB (2,784 x 1,856)
eosdedicatedspeedlite: E-TTL II autoflash with all EX Series Speedlites
filenumbering: Continuous numbering Auto reset Manual reset (the image numbering is reset to 0001, a new folder is created automatically)
focusingscreen: Interchangeable (11 types, sold separately), Standard focusing screen: Ec-C IV
dustdeletionfeature: (1) Automatic sensor cleaning (2) User-activated sensor cleaning (3) Dust Delete Data appended to the captured image
afpoints: 45-point (19 high-precision cross-type AF points plus 26 Assist AF points)
colorspace: Selectable between sRGB and Adobe RGB
highlightwarning: In the single image display and (INFO) display, over-exposed highlight areas will blink
focusingmodes: Autofocus (One-Shot AF, Predictive AI Servo AF), Manual Focus (MF)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication and direct printing (Hi-Speed USB)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance, taken from imaging sensor
selectedafpointdisplay: Superimposed in viewfinder and on LCD panel
meteringmodes: Evaluative metering with the image sensor
printableimages: JPEG images compliant to Design rule for Camera File System (DPOF printing possible) and RAW/sRAW images captured with the EOS-1Ds Mark III
continuousshootingspeed: Approx. 5 fps (at a shutter speed of 1/(TBA) sec. or faster in all recording modes)
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the CMOS sensor
viewfinderinformation: AF (AF points, focus confirmation light, point selection mode, registration), Exposure (metering mode, spot metering area, shutter speed, aperture, manual exposure, AE lock, ISO speed, exposure level, exposure warning), Flash (flash ready, high-speed sync, FE lock, flash exposure level), Image (JPEG recording, RAW recording, shots remaining, maximum burst, white balance correction, memory card information), Battery check
displayformat: Single image, 4-image index, 9-image index, Jump, AF point, Magnified zoom (approx. 1.5x to 10x), Brightness or RGB Histogram, Auto rotate, Rotate Live View Function: view image before shooting on LCD monitor; live histogram and live simulation of exposure level possible with C.Fn IV-16-1
maximumburst: JPEG: approx. 56 frames RAW: approx. 12 frames RAW+JPEG: approx. (TBA) frames (Large/Fine)
